imdb.title: Ansatsu kyôshitsu
imdb.plot: A powerful creature claims that within a year, Earth will be destroyed by him, but he offers mankind a chance by becoming a homeroom teacher where he teaches his students about how to kill him. An assassination classroom begins.

episodes.title: OAD: School Trip
episodes.plot: The story begins after 70% of the moon was suddenly vaporized in an explosion. The super lifeform responsible for this catastrophe is a strange tentacled creature that can slink around at supersonic Mach 20 speeds. It has a 10 billion yen (US$100 million) price on its head, but for some reason, this creature ends up teaching a middle school class at the beginning of the school year. The students have until graduation to assassinate the teacher, or it will destroy Earth as well.

episodes.title: OVA: Meeting Time
episodes.plot: The First meeting between Koro Sensei and Mr. Karasum.

episodes.title: Summer Festival Time
episodes.plot: Koro Sensei and his students try some matchmaking at the end of their island trip. Class 3-E's eventful summer ends with a taste of pure festival fun.

episodes.title: Kaede Time
episodes.plot: Kaede comes up with a delicious plan of attack, Class 3-E plays an intense game of Cops and Robbers, and Koro Sensei is accused of a serious crime.

episodes.title: Itona Horibe Time
episodes.plot: Koro Sensei faces off against the powerful, tentacled Itona and his handler Shiro yet again, revealing more of his teaching philosophy along the way.

episodes.title: Spinning Time
episodes.plot: Itona endears himself to the boys in Class 3-E as he shows off his assassination creation. The students call each other code names for an entire day.

episodes.title: Leader Time
episodes.plot: Competition between the elite A Class and downtrodden E Class heats up at the school sports festival, with Isogai's livelihood hanging in the balance.

episodes.title: Before & After Time
episodes.plot: After an accident, the E Class winds up doing a whole different kind of studying off campus. But will they have a chance to bone up for the midterms?

episodes.title: Reaper Time, Part 1
episodes.plot: A well-intentioned act leads to a falling-out with Professor Bitch. Soon the E Class finds itself facing off alone against a formidable assassin foe.

episodes.title: Reaper Time, Part 2
episodes.plot: When Koro Sensei and Mr. Karasuma reach the Reaper's hideout, it's anyone's guess who'll come out on top--especially with wild-card Irina in the mix.

episodes.title: Round Two Time
episodes.plot: The students consider their future career options. Nagisa struggles to come to terms with his talent; meanwhile, his mother has her own plans for him.

episodes.title: School Festival Time
episodes.plot: Each class at Kunugigaoka Academy is competing for the highest sales totals in the school festival. How can the E Class even hope to stand a chance?

episodes.title: End-of-Term Time, 2nd Period
episodes.plot: It's exam time again, and the cream-of-the-crop A Class is a bigger threat than ever before. Top-ranking Asano, however, has something up his sleeve.

episodes.title: Think Outside the Box Time
episodes.plot: The end-of-term exams come down to one doozy of a final problem. Principal Asano comes to Koro Sensei with a little wager that has a lot riding on it.

episodes.title: Let Live Time
episodes.plot: Principal Asano recalls his first foray into the world of education. In the drama festival, the E Class puts on a play with a few unexpected twists.

episodes.title: Secret Identity Time
episodes.plot: As the E Class cleans up after the drama festival, they learn that one of their classmates is hiding a big secret connected to Koro Sensei's past.

episodes.title: Confession Time
episodes.plot: After a tense and terrifying encounter with a student who has her own reasons to kill him, Koro Sensei begins to come clean about who he really is.

episodes.title: Past Time
episodes.plot: The E Class is left reeling after Koro Sensei's revelations about his past deeds and identity--information that may affect their assassination plans.

episodes.title: Discord Time
episodes.plot: With the class split into two factions over whether to kill Koro Sensei or try to save him, Koro Sensei himself suggests a way of settling the issue.

episodes.title: Outcome Time
episodes.plot: Koro Sensei's fate comes down to a battle between old friends Karma and Nagisa. A daunting new obstacle throws a wrench into the E Class's plans.

episodes.title: Outer Space Time
episodes.plot: Class 3-E goes to crazy lengths--or is it heights?--to track down confidential information that might just help them keep Koro Sensei alive.

episodes.title: Valentine's Day Time
episodes.plot: With high-school entrance exams looming, Nagisa is unsure which path his future should take. Class 3-E greets Valentine's Day with chocolates aplenty.

episodes.title: Trust Time
episodes.plot: Koro Sensei has one more project planned to close out the year with his beloved E Class, but the government's own plans threaten to get in the way.

episodes.title: Happy Birthday Time
episodes.plot: The students fight to see their teacher one last time. A figure from Koro Sensei's past arrives with a serious grudge against the super-creature.

episodes.title: Final Boss Time
episodes.plot: Koro-sensei faces off against Kotaro Yanagisawa and the Reaper in a final showdown.

episodes.title: Graduation Time
episodes.plot: Time is running out, and the E Class students must decide once and for all whether to kill the teacher who so changed their lives over the past year.

episodes.title: Future Time
episodes.plot: Graduation day: one of life's chapters ends and another begins as the students and teachers of Class 3-E go on to forge their own paths in the world.

episodes.title: Assassination Time
episodes.plot: A creature who blasted the moon into a crescent shows up at Kunugigaoka Junior High School--and he's giving the students a year to assassinate him!

episodes.title: Baseball Time
episodes.plot: The reasoning behind the E Class's segregation is revealed. Nagisa tracks Koro Sensei's weak points in the hopes of using them to take him down.

episodes.title: Karma Time
episodes.plot: The brilliant, belligerent Karma Akabane, Nagisa's former classmate, joins 3-E and immediately jumps into the assassination mission with both feet.

episodes.title: Grown-Up Time
episodes.plot: A new foreign-language teacher comes to 3-E with some major ulterior motives... among other things. Will she get any closer to killing Koro Sensei?

episodes.title: Assembly Time
episodes.plot: Before the torturous school assembly begins, Okuda attempts to poison Koro Sensei in an unexpected way... with unexpected results.

episodes.title: Test Time
episodes.plot: Time for midterms! Koro Sensei gives his aspiring assassins an ultimatum as they battle a grueling test and the disdain of the rest of the school.

episodes.title: School Trip Time - 1st Period
episodes.plot: The students go on a school trip to Kyoto, where they must still keep assassination foremost in their minds. Kanzaki faces trouble from her past.

episodes.title: School Trip Time - 2nd Period
episodes.plot: The E Class gives a pro sniper plenty of chances to take down Koro Sensei, then try to make the most of what's left of their school trip to Kyoto.

episodes.title: Transfer Student Time
episodes.plot: A new student joins the E Class with a singleminded focus on assassination that drives her classmates to distraction. Koro Sensei to the rescue!

episodes.title: LR Time
episodes.plot: Irina's teacher Lovro makes an appearance and sees how friendly and familiar she's gotten with Class E. Because of this, he tells her to leave and Irina is left with the choice to either stay with Class E, or go.

episodes.title: Transfer Student Time - 2nd Period
episodes.plot: Another new student throws everyone for a loop. His raw power is one thing, but what's with these mysterious ties he claims to have with Koro Sensei?

episodes.title: Ball Game Tournament Time
episodes.plot: The E Class boys must play the Baseball Club in an exhibition game meant to humiliate them. Can Koro Sensei's unique coaching style make a difference?

episodes.title: Talent Time
episodes.plot: Jolly Mr. Takaoka comes to assist Mr. Karasuma with training, but his unconventional methods have everyone upset. Nagisa reveals a hidden talent.

episodes.title: Vision Time
episodes.plot: Koro Sensei exposes a major weakness, and Terasaka interrupts a fun summer day out with an assassination attempt that goes a little too far.

episodes.title: End-of-Term Time
episodes.plot: For finals, Koro Sensei gives his class a new goal--with an irresistible reward. The E Class makes its own deal with the top-tier A Class's Big Five.

episodes.title: School's Out - 1st Term
episodes.plot: After two days of exams, the results are in. Both the ace A Class and the end E Class must come to terms with the outcome--and so must Koro Sensei.

episodes.title: Island Time
episodes.plot: The E Class trains intently under a pro killer to prepare for their island assassination. Once there, they must make sure everything falls into place.

episodes.title: Action Time
episodes.plot: The summer assassination attempt is followed by a crisis affecting nearly half the E Class. Can the rest think and move fast enough to save them?

episodes.title: Pandemonium Time
episodes.plot: The E Class must put their lessons into practice as they tackle an intimidating hotel brimming with baddies--and all without Koro Sensei's help.

episodes.title: Karma Time - 2nd Period
episodes.plot: Karma must use his head to get past a formidable foe. Nagisa goes undercover as the E Class continues to sneak its way to the hotel's top floor.

episodes.title: Takaoka Time
episodes.plot: The students take on one last assassin opponent before meeting the shadowy figure who's holding the virus remedy hostage in exhange for Koro Sensei.

episodes.title: Nagisa Time
episodes.plot: It's a showdown on the roof of the Fukuma Denjo Hotel with the lives of half the E Class in the balance. Can Nagisa find a way to come out on top?
